pkgmetadata.longdescription: My personal code collection.Link to [Github](https://github.com/thomascamminady/camminapy).## InstallationInstall via `pip`:```bashpip install camminapy```Install via `poetry`:```bashpoetry add camminapy```## DevelopmentTo create the documentation, run:```bashmake doc```To publish an updated version to PyPi:```bashmake publish```
